property_description:
Great value, key-ready apartments available to purchase next to the Autódromo Internacional do Algarve Racetrack in Portimão. Situated in the idyllic location of Mexilhoeira Grande, 20 minutes from Portimão city centre, and approximately 25 minutes to Lagos, or to Meia Praia beach - a pristine stretch of golden sands and turquoise water.

Previously a bank repossession, these homes are available for a limited time at exceptionally low prices, rarely seen for this size and style of contemporary property in the Algarve.

Sold furnished, this two bedroom apartment comprises a spacious living room in open plan with a dining area, two large bedrooms, two bathrooms and a fully equipped kitchen with appliances. Private terrace with countryside views.

Air conditioning, Wi-Fi, double glazed windows, underground parking and storage room.

All apartments offer convenient access to a large outdoor swimming pool, an indoor pool, fully equipped gym, sauna, spa, bar and restaurant, all available just steps away from your doorstep.

property_description: This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity to gain an affordable investment in the property market in Portugal. As part of a fully-operational, successful rental programme, owners can choose their own usage and then earn income when they're not using their home, thanks to the increasing popularity of the AIA, which host events all-year round. Sold fully furnished, this one bedroom apartment comprises a spacious living room in open plan with a dining area, a large bedroom, a bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen, complete with appliances, including a stovetop, oven, fridge, water boiler, toaster and washing machine. All apartments offer convenient access to a large outdoor swimming pool, an indoor pool, fully equipped gym, sauna, spa, bar and restaurant, all available just steps away from your doorstep. As a resident, you will benefit from exclusive discounts on select services. Additional features include: air conditioning, Wi-Fi, double glazed windows, underground parking and storage room. Situated less than 20 minutes from Portimão city centre, you can easily immerse yourself in the vibrant culture, entertainment, and shopping that this charming city offers. Additionally, the stunning Meia Praia beach, a pristine stretch of golden sands and turquoise waters, awaits you a mere 23 minutes away. Furthermore, the city centre of Lagos can be reached in approximately 25 minutes, promising a wealth of historical charm and captivating experiences.

property_description:
Great-value, key-ready apartment available to purchase next to the Autódromo Internacional do Algarve Racetrack in Portimão.

This is a one-of-a-kind opportunity to gain an affordable investment in the property market in Portugal. As part of a fully-operational, successful rental programme, owners can choose their own usage and then earn income when they're not using their home, thanks to the increasing popularity of the AIA, which host events all-year round.

Sold fully furnished, this three bedroom home comprises a spacious living room in open plan with a dining area, three large bedrooms, two bathrooms and a fully equipped kitchen, complete with appliances, including a stovetop, oven, fridge, water boiler, toaster and washing machine. The private terrace offers views of the countryside.

All apartments offer convenient access to a large outdoor swimming pool, and usage of facilities at the next door hotel, including an indoor pool, fully equipped gym, sauna, spa, bar and restaurant.

Additional features include: air conditioning, Wi-Fi, double glazed windows, underground parking and storage room.

Situated less than 20 minutes from Portimão city centre, with its vibrant culture, entertainment, and shopping, and 25 minutes to stunning Meia Praia beach. The city centre of Lagos can be reached in approximately 25 minutes.
